title:
Generalizations of wreath product identities via Garsia-Gessel
  bijections
abstract:
Garsia and Gessel constructed innovative bijections to obtain multivariate
generating functions of permutation statistics. In 2011, Biaogioli and Zeng
successfully derived four and six variate distributions on the set of wreath
product. In this paper, we will generalize the four variate identities from BZ
to any positive dominant ordering. And we will simplify the six variate
distribution function under the ordering originally defined by Adin and
Roichman in 2001.
